example_phrases_en: Prescribe Amoxicillin 500mg three times a day for 7 days.
Start Paracetamol 1g every 6 hours as needed for fever or pain.
example_phrases_ms: Beri preskripsi Amoxicillin 500mg tiga kali sehari selama 7 hari.
Mula Paracetamol 1g setiap 6 jam jika perlu untuk demam atau sakit.
gemini_instructions: Identify any new medications prescribed. Extract the drug name, dosage, frequency, route (if specified), and duration. Note the indication if mentioned.
notes_for_scribe: Ensure accuracy of drug names, dosages, and frequencies. Clarify any ambiguities (e.g., 'TID' vs 'three times a day').

example_phrases_en: Taper Prednisolone dose over the next two weeks.
example_phrases_ms: Kurangkan dos Prednisolone secara beransur-ansur dalam dua minggu akan datang.
gemini_instructions: Note any adjustments to existing medications, including dose changes (increase/decrease), frequency changes, or medication switches. Specify the drug and the exact change.
notes_for_scribe: Clearly document the old regimen (if stated) and the new regimen for adjusted medications to avoid confusion.

example_phrases_en: Order a full blood count and renal profile.
Schedule a chest X-ray to rule out pneumonia.
Plan for an outpatient MRI of the lumbar spine.
example_phrases_ms: Pesan ujian darah penuh dan profil buah pinggang.
Jadualkan X-ray dada untuk menolak radang paru-paru.
Rancang untuk MRI tulang belakang lumbar sebagai pesakit luar.
gemini_instructions: List all diagnostic tests ordered by the clinician. Specify the type of test and the reason for ordering if provided.
notes_for_scribe: Include any specific instructions for the test (e.g., 'fasting blood sugar', 'contrast CT').

example_phrases_en: Refer patient to Cardiology for further evaluation of chest pain.
Arrange consultation with a Neurologist for persistent headaches.
Will seek opinion from Orthopedics regarding knee pain.
example_phrases_ms: Rujuk pesakit kepada pakar Kardiologi untuk penilaian lanjut sakit dada.
Aturkan konsultasi dengan pakar Neurologi untuk sakit kepala yang berterusan.
Akan dapatkan pandangan daripada pakar Ortopedik mengenai sakit lutut.
gemini_instructions: Note any referrals made to other specialists or services. Specify the specialty or service and the reason for referral.
notes_for_scribe: Indicate if the referral is urgent or routine if specified.

example_phrases_en: Follow up in 2 weeks for review.
Return to clinic if symptoms worsen or no improvement in 3 days.
example_phrases_ms: Datang semula ke klinik jika gejala bertambah teruk atau tiada peningkatan dalam 3 hari.
gemini_instructions: Document the plan for follow-up, including the timeframe (e.g., 'in 2 weeks', 'PRN'), specific date if given, and any conditions for returning sooner.
notes_for_scribe: Be specific about follow-up timing. 'PRN' (as needed) is common but try to capture more specific triggers if mentioned.
